title: The Complete Gossip Girl Series
description: The Gossip Girl series complete in 12 books. All are softcover except the prequel to the "It Had To Be You" which is only available in hardcover. Titles included Girl #1You Know You Love Me All I Want Is Everything Because I'm Worth It I Like It Like That You're The One That I Want Nobody Does It Better Nothing Can Keep Us Together Only In Your Dreams Would I Lie to You Don't You Forget About Me It Had to Be You
author: Cecily von Ziegesar
